query: SELECT epic_number, epic_name, scenario_number, scenario_title, status, priority FROM bdd_test_scenarios ORDER BY epic_number, scenario_number;
command: mysql --batch --raw --column-names --default-character-set=utf8mb4 --host gateway02.us-east-1.prod.aws.tidbcloud.com --port 4000 --user 2TnkFjGBKdfpupi.root --database B3x5NWCFiG4wF9DctXvqsL --execute SELECT epic_number, epic_name, scenario_number, scenario_title, status, priority FROM bdd_test_scenarios ORDER BY epic_number, scenario_number;
